html:
2026-0134
2026-02-13PSPCNational Capital ActAcquisition of property ** NCC ** Asticou Center complex (the parcel)Order authorizing the National Capital Commission (NCC) to (1) acquire the parcel of land (lots 6 642 520 and 6 642 522) from PSPC; and (2) grant, in perpetuity, the Province of Quebec, (i) of real servitudes in order to keep, maintain, repair and replace watermain and stormwater infrastructures or other public utility infrastructures, and (ii) of real and perpetual servitudes that are or may be required for the construction or proper operation of a public health and social services establishment on adjacent land (lot 6 642 521).N/A
subject: Acquisition of property ** NCC ** Asticou Center complex (the parcel)
precis: Order authorizing the National Capital Commission (NCC) to (1) acquire the parcel of land (lots 6 642 520 and 6 642 522) from PSPC; and (2) grant, in perpetuity, the Province of Quebec, (i) of real servitudes in order to keep, maintain, repair and replace watermain and stormwater infrastructures or other public utility infrastructures, and (ii) of real and perpetual servitudes that are or may be required for the construction or proper operation of a public health and social services establishment on adjacent land (lot 6 642 521).
